full_description:
Job Overview
We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Analyst to join our innovative team. In this role, you will harness your analytical expertise to interpret complex data sets, develop insightful reports, and support strategic decision-making processes. Your proactive approach and technical proficiency will drive improvements across business operations, ensuring data-driven solutions that propel our organization forward. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge tools and methodologies in a collaborative environment committed to excellence and continuous growth.
\n
Responsibilities
\n
\n
Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets using SQL, Python, R, and ETL tools like Talend to extract meaningful insights.
\n
Design and develop interactive dashboards and reports utilizing Tableau, Power BI, Looker, and other visualization platforms to communicate findings clearly.
\n
Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment to define project requirements, prioritize tasks, and deliver timely results.
\n
Support the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) for data projects, including planning, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
\n
Conduct business analysis to identify opportunities for process improvements and automation using VBA, Bash (Unix shell), and database design principles.
\n
Manage project timelines and resources effectively through project management best practices to ensure successful delivery.
\n
Maintain comprehensive documentation of data models, workflows, and technical specifications using Visio or similar tools.
\n
Engage in business analysis activities to understand stakeholder needs and translate them into technical solutions that enhance data accessibility and usability.
\n
\n
Skills
\n
\n
Proficiency in SQL for querying relational databases such as Microsoft SQL Server and Oracle.
\n
Strong experience with data visualization tools including Tableau, Power BI, and Looker.
\n
Knowledge of programming languages like Python and R for advanced analytics and automation tasks.
\n
Familiarity with ETL processes using Talend or similar tools to facilitate data integration from multiple sources.
\n
Understanding of database design principles for creating efficient data models supporting analytics initiatives.
\n
Experience with SDLC methodologies within Agile frameworks to manage project lifecycles effectively.
\n
Ability to perform comprehensive business analysis to identify key metrics and develop actionable insights.
\n
Skills in analysis techniques using analysis skills such as statistical methods or predictive modeling.
\n
Experience working with linked data concepts for integrating disparate datasets across platforms.
\n
Knowledge of VBA scripting for automating repetitive tasks within Microsoft Office applications.
\n
Familiarity with Unix shell scripting (Bash) for server-side automation tasks. Join us as an Analyst where your expertise will shape strategic initiatives through innovative data solutions! We value energetic professionals eager to make a tangible impact by transforming complex information into clear, actionable insights that drive success across our organization.
\n
\n
Pay: $29.61 - $35.66 per hour
\n
Work Location: In person
